dcterms:creator: C. Boididou
K. Andreadou
S. Papadopoulos
D.-T. Dang-Nguyen
G. Boato
M. Riegler
Y. Kompatsiaris
dcterms:description: The Twitter dataset is used for detecting fake content on Twitter, containing tweets with text content, attached images/videos, and additional social context information. The dataset was pre-processed to remove tweets without text or images and duplicates.
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Jin
J. Cao
H. Guo
Y. Zhang
J. Luo
dcterms:description: The Weibo dataset contains text, user information, and images collected from Weibo social media from 2012 to 2016. The dataset is written in Chinese and was translated into English for this study. Each text is linked with images, and only the first image linked to each text was considered.
dcterms:title: Weibo Dataset
